Description:
Roles & ResponsiblilitiesManage all aspects in Electronics and Telecommunication Projects according to PMI Methodology and approved processes and procedures.
Perform installation, testing and commissioning of highly engineered materials, supervise & monitor related activities.
Coordinate with ED -PMD Manager to develop the project plan before starting his project.
Responsible for achieving project scope, according to project budget and scheduled plan.
Responsible and capable for units and/or system installation, testing and commissioning to complete and finalize all contractual conditions and needs.
Monitor and control project schedule plan and follow up project's team to achieve their assignments accordingly.
Conduct regular meeting with client, client consultants to update them with project status, and to solve any problems affecting project's progress.
Report to ED PMD manager on daily basis stating project performance and tasks accomplished according to project's schedule plan.
Report to ED PMDM if any changes required in project's scope, following the change management procedures to get approval for these changes.
Coordinate with Sales and Marketing team along with clients on work progress and needs.
Handle product complains and make recommendations to superiors regarding goodwill replacement of products, suggesting methods of quality control and checking to determine that equipment and systems are functioning properly.
Cooperate, coordinate and exchange data, information pertaining to systems & projects with staff in other divisions and keep well informed of such issues in order to cover the gap in case of emergencies.Skills
Skills:
University degree in Electronic/Communication / Electrical Engineering.
Minimum 3-5 years in the field with supervisory.
Field of experience (CCTV System, Digital Video Storage &Transmission, Access Control, Intruder Detection, etc...).
Knowledge, Capabilities & Skills
English &; Arabic Language.
Computer and software applications related to the field.
Ability to make judgments and take decisions.
Good analytical, interpersonal and effective communications skills.
Driving License.
